      • getState

        public com.intellij.openapi.vfs.encoding.EncodingManagerImpl.State getState()
        Specified by:
        getState in interface PersistentStateComponent<com.intellij.openapi.vfs.encoding.EncodingManagerImpl.State>
        Returns:
        a component state. All properties, public and annotated fields are serialized. Only values, which differ from the default (i.e., the value of newly instantiated class) are serialized. null value indicates that the returned state won't be stored, as a result previously stored state will be used.
        See Also:
        XmlSerializer

      • loadState

        public void loadState(com.intellij.openapi.vfs.encoding.EncodingManagerImpl.State state)
        Description copied from interface: PersistentStateComponent
        This method is called when new component state is loaded. The method can and will be called several times, if config files were externally changed while IDE was running.

        State object should be used directly, defensive copying is not required.

        Specified by:
        loadState in interface PersistentStateComponent<com.intellij.openapi.vfs.encoding.EncodingManagerImpl.State>
        Parameters:
        state - loaded component state
        See Also:
        XmlSerializerUtil.copyBean(Object, Object)

      • getEncoding

        public java.nio.charset.Charset getEncoding(VirtualFile virtualFile,
                                            boolean useParentDefaults)
        Specified by:
        getEncoding in class EncodingRegistry
        Parameters:
        virtualFile - file to get encoding for
        useParentDefaults - true to determine encoding from the parent
        Returns:
        encoding configured for this file in Settings|File Encodings or, if useParentDefaults is true, encoding configured for nearest parent of virtualFile or, null if there is no configured encoding found.
